bibl.title: Yet Another Conflict over a Cloak in an Unpublished Enteuxis (P. Sorb. inv. 2444)
bibl.seg: Laura Aguer & Diane Coomans, Yet Another Conflict over a Cloak in an Unpublished Enteuxis (P. Sorb. inv. 2444).

Edition of a papyrus from the Sorbonne's collection that was recovered during the excavations of Pierre Jouguet in Magdola and Ghoran; it contains an unpublished enteuxis. Ghoran, 255-220 BC. - Pp. 339-340: Appendix. The Uses of ὄμνυμι in the Ptolemaic Petitions.
bibl.note: Edition of a papyrus from the Sorbonne's collection that was recovered during the excavations of Pierre Jouguet in Magdola and Ghoran; it contains an unpublished enteuxis. Ghoran, 255-220 BC. - Pp. 339-340: Appendix. The Uses of ὄμνυμι in the Ptolemaic Petitions.
